name: Sky Trader Beta - Experiment 1
description:
The very first test build of Sky Trader... we want to test out some combat mechanics and get a bit of feedback from our future fans!

We are still actively developing Sky Trader, and envision the final game to be much more involved than this early prototype. Check back often for updates and news!

The controls are simple...

  • A / D - Steer left and right
  • W / S - Advance or reduce throttle settings. There are 3 forward settings and 1 reverse setting.
  • Left Mouse Button - Fire weapon at aim point.

We know the game lacks a lot of conveyance and polish, but we would be excited for any early adopters to check it out in this early state. Enjoy!

Credits:

  • Developers: Jeremy Jones, Matt Burkett, Rob Bro
  • Artists: Aniruddha Khanwelkar, Jeremy Jones
  • Producer and Marketing guy: Seth Crofton
